author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hakuten to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Hakuten Corp
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 60,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 27 and March 2
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 100 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/NdmV5F
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
